content:
It sounds like you're open to exploring different festival options within a reasonable distance from Boston.

I've got some good news for you! There are a few festivals happening in the region that might interest you. Since you mentioned you had a great experience volunteering at the Harvard Athletic Complex, I'll focus on outdoor festivals with similar settings. Here are a few options:

1. **XPoNential Music Festival** (July 26-28) in Camden, NJ ( approx. 5 hours from Boston) - This festival features a mix of indie, rock, and folk music. Volunteers can help with stage management, artist hospitality, and more.
2. **Green River Festival** (July 12-14) in Greenfield, MA (approx. 2.5 hours from Boston) - This festival celebrates music, food, and community with a focus on roots, rock, and folk music. Volunteers can assist with ticketing, concessions, and stage support.
3. **Levitate Music and Arts Festival** (July 10-12) in Marshfield, MA (approx. 1 hour from Boston) - This festival features a mix of rock, pop, and jam band music, along with art installations and activities. Volunteers can help with festival operations, hospitality, and more.

These festivals might offer similar experiences to what you enjoyed at the Harvard Athletic Complex. I can try to find more information on volunteer opportunities and application processes for each festival if you're interested!

Which one (or more) of these festivals catches your attention?
